title.rendered: AIS Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
AIS Airlines is a Dutch airline headquartered at Lelystad Airport in the Netherlands. In addition to scheduled flights, it operates charter and wet lease services.

 

AIS Airlines Address: AIS Airlines

Flamingoweg 20

8218 NW Lelystad-Airport

The Netherlands

Phone Number : +46 770 790 700

Email: callcenter@aisairlines.com

AIS Airlines Official website: https://www.aisairlines.com/

AIS Airlines Address: AIS Airlines Svenska Callcenter

Overstevagen 65

784 63 Borlange

Phone Number : +46-770-790 700

Email: callcenter@aisairlines.se

AIS Airlines Baggage Allowance

AIS Airlines Baggage Allowance

View AIS Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

AIS Airlines Special Assistance Services:

Travelling with pet in AIS Airlines : 

For more details visit : https://www.aisairlines.com/general-conditions/

AIS Airlines Fleet

Eight BAE Jetstream 32 turbo-props

 Queries handled AIS Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the AIS Airlines  Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the AIS Airlines  : (click on the stars below)
